SEARCH
Package org.cst8288Lab2.DTO

Class StudentCourse

java.lang.Object
org.cst8288Lab2.DTO.StudentCourse
public class StudentCourse extends Object
A Data Transfer Object (DTO) class that represents the association between a student and a course.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    StudentCourse(Student student, Course course, int term, int year)
    Constructs a new StudentCourse object with the specified student, course, term, and year.
